Docs.summary: Specifies the automatic transaction type requested by the component.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When using the .NET Installation Tool (Regsvcs.exe), the transaction option for a <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent> defaults to Disabled.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates the use of the TransactionOption type.
[!code-cpp[EnterpriseServicesTransactionOption#0](~/add/codesnippet/CPP/t-system.enterpriseservi_15_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServicesTransactionOption#0](~/add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/t-system.enterpriseservi_15_1.vb)] [!code-cs[EnterpriseServicesTransactionOption#0](~/add/codesnippet/CSharp/t-system.enterpriseservi_15_1.cs)]
